member.name: M:Extensions.Data.SqlServer.ExecuteMethods.ExecuteDataSet(System.Data.SqlClient.SqlConnection,System.String,System.Data.SqlClient.SqlParameter[])

member.name: M:Extensions.Data.SqlServer.ExecuteMethods.IsStoredProcedure(System.String)
member.summary: Determines whether [is stored procedure] [the specified query].
